steps: step 3: Click on button 'Edge Compute 2.0' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/workload'
step 4: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/storage'
step 5: Click on p  -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/snapshots'
step 7: Perform input and div actions
step 8: Add ipv4 rules and submit actions
step 9: Click on button 'Firewall' -> Navigate to page 'service/manage-workloads/*/compute-cloud/automation/networks'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
